listitem.para: whether to send a STRONGSWAN Vendor ID payload to the peer. Acceptable values are: no (the default) and yes. This used to be required because strongswan rejects certain proposals with private use numbers such as esp=twofish or esp=serpent unless it receives a strongswan vendorid by the peer. This option sends such an (unversioned) vendor id. Note that libreswan and strongswan no longer support twofish or serpent, so enabling this option likely will no longer do anything.
